LanguageData.Bullet_Cycler_Rifle.label: cycler rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_CyclerRifle.label: Cycler Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_CyclerRifle.description: The cycler is an older design of rifle and fits into the slugthrower class, firing solid shots enveloped in energy, not blaster bolts. The weapon emitted a unique sound when fired, rather like a cross between a blaster and a musket.
LanguageData.Gun_CyclerRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_CyclerRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_CyclerRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Cycler Rifle
